'''Maria Lemón''' is a former [[Mojang Studios]] Game Developer who worked on {{JE}}.<ref>{{tweet|MiaLem_n|784256687913836545|@ForeverMaster0 Hello! Yes I did, started working monday so almost finished my first week. :)|Oct 7, 2016}}</ref> She joined the team on October 3, 2016,<ref>{{tweet|MiaLem_n|782867249900187649|First day at new job! Ready or not here I come Mojang!|Oct 3, 2016}}</ref> and was formally introduced by [[Jens Bergensten]] on October 11, 2016.<ref>{{tweet|jeb|785722900498243584|Happy to introduce our newest Minecraft (Java) developer, Maria Lemón! @mialem_n She's previously worked on Angry Birds 2 and Stardoll :)|Oct 11, 2016}}</ref>

Maria announced her departure from Mojang on March 31, 2020.<ref>https://twitter.com/MiaLem_n/status/1244871200251265024</ref>

== Trivia ==

* Maria's ''Minecraft'' character first appeared in blog posts in the image for the [[16w40a]] snapshot, hiding in a [[shulker box]].<ref>{{tweet|ladyagnes|784044371788369920|@MCKaleb01 @_grum It's actually @_grum  and @MiaLem_n :D|Oct 6, 2016}}</ref>
* {{IN|je}}, if a player types "excitedze" into the search bar in the recipe book, their language is automatically switched to Pirate Speak.
